name: Troll Sweeper
description:
Use your wits and fireballs to save a fantasy kingdom from the troll invasion in this beautiful mine sweeper style game!

A new approach to old school mechanics, that makes a game fun and cool!

Features:
- beautiful fantasy style
- a fireball can wipe out any hidden troll!
- 3 difficulty levels
- use landscape to memorise trolls' positions

The game has advertising.
